::Whistler::
    He walks on in silence pondering the meaning of life, the size of the 
universe, and other inconsequential things when he hears a twig snap.  He 
looks around but sees nothing.  "Hmm.  Any idea what that was?  Nevermind 
probably just a small woodland creature."
